definition: surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy

sentences.english: The absence of the fetal cranial vault in anencephaly is shown here.
sentences.chinese: 无脑儿显示胎儿颅穹窿缺陷。

sentences.english: Anencephaly is absence of the fetal cranial vault.
sentences.chinese: 无脑儿是胎儿颅穹窿缺陷。

sentences.english: The sitting position is most often used for neurosurgical procedures, especially in the posterior fossa.
sentences.chinese: 坐位手术通常用于神经外科手术，特别是颅后窝手术。

sentences.english: This is the fifth, or trigeminal, cranial nerve.
sentences.chinese: 这是第五次，或三叉神经，颅神经。

sentences.english: Gliomas in children , therefore , are most common in the posterior fossa.
sentences.chinese: 因此，儿童胶质瘤在颅后窝最常见。

sentences.english: Objective To study absorbed mechanism of free bone auto-graft in cranium.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颅顶部自体骨游离移植被吸收的内在机制。

sentences.english: Its volume expansion has been associated with neural compression after posterior fossa decompression.
sentences.chinese: 它的体积膨胀与颅后窝减压术后的神经症状相关。

sentences.english: Malformation of the craniocervical region, also known as malformation of the foramen magnum region, relates to many diseases.
sentences.chinese: 颅颈部畸形叉称枕骨大孔区畸形，涉及的疾病较多。

definition: bones of the temple (on the human head)/see 顳顬|颞颥, temple
